text:
Axial (http://www.axial.net) | NYC | Full time | On-site

We are hiring engineers, data scientists and analysts to build out our Data Team.

Our stack includes Postgres, Redshift and Apache Kafka and it's all glued together using a combination of Python, Perl, Java and SQL.

If you are in NYC and want to get in on the ground floor while we build the Data Team, send me a note. I am at farhan.ahmed@axial.net.

We also have a bunch of other openings -- Python engineer, front end engineer, PM -- so check out our Careers page.
